title: Error when building SkiaSharp
body:
Hello,

first let's say thank you for your incedible work.

I forked SkiaSharp and trying to compile it. Did everything like described on the README.md. When running the bootstrap I get an error:

```Executing task: externals-uwp
Adding C:/Entwicklung/SkiaSharp/externals/depot_tools to Environment Variable PATH
Setting Environment Variable PATH to C:/Entwicklung/SkiaSharp/externals/depot_tools;...
Setting Environment Variable GYP_GENERATORS to msvs
Setting Environment Variable GYP_DEFINES to skia_arch_type='x86_64' skia_gpu=1
Running 'sync-and-gyp'...
        GYP_GENERATORS = msvs
        GYP_DEFINES = skia_arch_type='x86_64' skia_gpu=1
An error occured when executing task 'externals-uwp'.
Error: System could not find the given file
```

What do I wrong here? Missed I something?

Best regards,
Dirk
